titleStmt.title: England's over-joy at the Duke of Monmouth's return by the author of Englands lamentation for his departure: reflecting on his heroick actions.
titleStmt.author: J. F.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T. Dawks, his Majestier British printer, at the Blew Anchor in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: The author of Englands lamentation for the Duke of Monmouth's departure = J.F.
Verse - "This morn, as in my bed I slee-".

After imprint: Where will speedily be published a methodical history of the Popish Plot, demonstrated and illustrated in 52 choice figures, ... a journal of the plot. There was lately published a large sheet, called Sir Edmundbury Godfrey's murder made visible; ... being a neat ornament for gentlemens houses.
Reproduction of the originals in: British Library and William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.

person.persName: T. Dawks, his Majestier British printer
